job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T15:10:54.000Z", "description": "

About the job

We are a hyper-growth eCommerce start-up with a mission to bring a smile to people's faces by connecting them to products that bring nourishment, love, memories, connection, nostalgia, and comfort. We've recently closed our Series C funding for $110M and are looking to scale our AI & Data practice.


We are looking for a top Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in New York. You will be joining a small team of experienced ML engineers and have the opportunity to learn and have a significant impact on mission critical projects. The team is building deep learning models for RecSystems, Personalization, and Search functionality.


Core Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams of data scientists, data engineers, software engineers, and machine learning engineers.
  • Research and implement best-in-class ML approaches to e-commerce problems. 
  • Develop a deep subject matter expertise of how our marketplace functions across the entire user journey
  • Own and iterate upon our various recommendation , personalization, and search engines. 
  • Oversee end-to-end model lifecycle development
  • Deploy ML models into production
  • Drive meaningful ROI and impact upon our full funnel acquisition and retention


Basic Qualifications

  • B.S. in a quantitative field i.e. Computer Science, Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, etc.
  • 1-5 years of experience building production level Machine Learning models
  • Excellent programming and debugging skills in Python
  • Experience with deep learning frameworks & libraries i.e. PyTorch, Tensorflow, etc.
  • Strong ML background in at least one of the following areas: NLP, Search, recommendation, personalization, ranking/relevance, etc.


Nice to Have:

  • Advanced Degree in a quantitative field (M.S. / Ph.D)
  • Direct E-Commerce Experience
